price: 12. Milik-Nyalah perbendaharaan langit dan bumi, Dia melapangkan rezeki dan membatasinya bagi siapa yang Dia kehendaki. Sungguh, Dia Maha Mengetahui segala sesuatu.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahu maqālīdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru innahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
